0.text: Innate: Ivern cannot attack nor damage non-epic  monsters. Instead, targeting a jungle camp initiates a 2.5 second  channel that will plant a grove upon the camp. Placing a grove costs  98.25 − 0.14 (based on level) health and  90 − 0.37 (based on level) mana. The channel cannot be cancelled in the first 0.15 seconds and in the last 0.5 seconds.
0.html: Innate: Ivern cannot attack nor damage non-epic monsters. Instead, targeting a jungle camp initiates a 2.5 second channel that will plant a grove upon the camp. Placing a grove costs  98.25 − 0.14 (based on level) health and  90 − 0.37 (based on level) mana. The channel cannot be cancelled in the first 0.15 seconds and in the last 0.5 seconds.
markedPassages: monsters
channel
98.25 − 0.14 (based on level) health
98.25 − 0.14 (based on level) health
90 − 0.37 (based on level) mana
90 − 0.37 (based on level) mana

1.text: Ivern cannot place a grove while he is unable to cast abilities.
1.html: Ivern cannot place a grove while he is unable to cast abilities.

2.text: The grove matures over 40 − 1 (based on level) seconds. When fully matured, Ivern can target the camp again to free it after a 0.5-second cast time, clearing the camp and receiving the  full gold and  full experience bounties. Using  Smite on a monster within the grove will instantly free the camp regardless of maturity.
2.html: The grove matures over 40 − 1 (based on level) seconds. When fully matured, Ivern can target the camp again to free it after a 0.5-second cast time, clearing the camp and receiving the full gold and  full experience bounties. Using Smite on a monster within the grove will instantly free the camp regardless of maturity.
markedPassages: full gold and  full experience
full gold
full experience
Smite

3.text: If the camp's large monster has already been slain prior to planting a grove, Ivern will free the camp upon completing the channel at no cost. Similarly, the grove will instantly mature if the large monster is slain.
3.html: If the camp's large monster has already been slain prior to planting a grove, Ivern will free the camp upon completing the channel at no cost. Similarly, the grove will instantly mature if the large monster is slain.

4.text: Starting at level 5, freeing the  Red Brambleback or the  Blue Sentinel leaves behind a sapling for 60 seconds that can be gathered by one allied  champion to gain the camp's respective buff, either the  Crest of Cinders or the  Crest of Insight. If an ally kills either monster, they also leave behind a sapling that only Ivern can consume.
4.html: Starting at level 5, freeing the Red Brambleback or the Blue Sentinel leaves behind a sapling for 60 seconds that can be gathered by one allied champion to gain the camp's respective buff, either the Crest of Cinders or the Crest of Insight. If an ally kills either monster, they also leave behind a sapling that only Ivern can consume.
markedPassages: Red Brambleback
Blue Sentinel
champion
Crest of Cinders
Crest of Insight

0.text: Active: Ivern throws a vine in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and  rooting them for a duration, during which they are also  revealed. Rootcaller can be recast while the target is  rooted.
0.html: Active: Ivern throws a vine in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and rooting them for a duration, during which they are also revealed. Rootcaller can be recast while the target is rooted.
markedPassages: rooting
revealed
rooted

1.text: Ivern and allied champions can select the target  rooted by Rootcaller to  dash to their location, with allies stopping at  their attack range and Ivern stopping within 125 units from the target.
1.html: Ivern and allied champions can select the target rooted by Rootcaller to dash to their location, with allies stopping at  their attack range and Ivern stopping within 125 units from the target.
markedPassages: rooted
dash
their attack range

2.text: Recast: Ivern  dashes to the target.
2.html: Recast: Ivern dashes to the target.
markedPassages: dashes

0.text: Passive: While Ivern is in  brush, his basic attacks are empowered to deal bonus magic damage  on-hit. This bonus persists for 3 seconds after leaving brush.
0.html: Passive: While Ivern is in brush, his basic attacks are empowered to deal bonus magic damage on-hit. This bonus persists for 3 seconds after leaving brush.
markedPassages: brush
on-hit

1.text: Active: Ivern grows a patch of  brush at the target location for 30 seconds, granting  sight of the area within and around it for 3 seconds. Spawning brush near terrain or other brush increases its radius.
1.html: Active: Ivern grows a patch of brush at the target location for 30 seconds, granting sight of the area within and around it for 3 seconds. Spawning brush near terrain or other brush increases its radius.
markedPassages: brush
sight

2.text: Ivern periodically stocks a Brushmaker charge, up to a maximum of 3.
2.html: Ivern periodically stocks a Brushmaker charge, up to a maximum of 3.

0.text: Active: Ivern places a seed on the target allied champion,  Daisy, or himself, granting the target a  shield for 2 seconds.
0.html: Active: Ivern places a seed on the target allied champion, Daisy, or himself, granting the target a shield for 2 seconds.
markedPassages: Daisy
shield

1.text: After 2 seconds, the seed explodes to deal magic damage to nearby enemies and  slow them for 2 seconds.
1.html: After 2 seconds, the seed explodes to deal magic damage to nearby enemies and slow them for 2 seconds.
markedPassages: slow

0.text: Active: Ivern summons his sentinel friend  Daisy to his side, who lands 350 units away from him in the target direction and remains on the field for up to 60 seconds as a controllable  pet.
0.html: Active: Ivern summons his sentinel friend Daisy to his side, who lands 350 units away from him in the target direction and remains on the field for up to 60 seconds as a controllable pet.
markedPassages: Daisy
pet

1.text: Daisy! can be recast at any time while  Daisy is alive.
1.html: Daisy! can be recast at any time while Daisy is alive.
markedPassages: Daisy

2.text: Recast: Ivern commands  Daisy to move to the target location. If cast on Ivern,  Daisy will follow him.
2.html: Recast: Ivern commands Daisy to move to the target location. If cast on Ivern, Daisy will follow him.
markedPassages: Daisy
Daisy

3.text: The recast of Daisy! can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control. See Pets for more details about  Daisy.
3.html: The recast of Daisy! can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control. See Pets for more details about Daisy.
markedPassages: cast-inhibiting crowd control
Daisy
possibleConcerningAbilities: The recast of Daisy! can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control. See Pets for more details about  Daisy.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Inspire: Grants you and all allies within 1000 units 30% bonus movement speed for 4 seconds (75 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – INSPIRE: Grants you and all allies within 1000 units 30% bonus movement speed for 4 seconds (75 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Motivate: Healing, shielding, or buffing allied champions (excluding yourself) grants you and them 25% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds (4 (per champion) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – MOTIVATE:  Healing,  shielding, or buffing allied champions (excluding yourself) grants you and them 25% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds (4 (per champion) second cooldown).

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Intervention: Call upon a beam of light to strike upon the target location after 2.5 seconds, granting sight of the area for the duration. Allies within the area are healed for 180 − 340 (based on target's level), while enemy champions within take 10% of target's maximum health as true damage. Can be used while dead. (90 second cooldown; 5500 range).
active.originText: UNIQUE – INTERVENTION: Call upon a beam of light to strike upon the target location after 2.5 seconds, granting  sight of the area for the duration. Allies within the area are  healed for 180 − 340 (based on target's level), while enemy champions within take 10% of target's maximum health as true damage. Can be used while dead. (90 second cooldown; 5500 range).

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Stasis: Put yourself in stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you untargetable and invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items (120 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – STASIS: Put yourself in  stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you  untargetable and  invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items (120 second cooldown).
